body: If the problem here was with `AT_CHECK`, then we should probably add some comments. Otherwise, sooner or later, someone will codemod those to become `AT_*` macros again. 😕 Ideally we'd modify pybind to know that it shouldn't display those messages. `HANDLE_TH_ERRORS` macros disable them.
body_html: If the problem here was with AT_CHECK, then we should probably add some comments. Otherwise, sooner or later, someone will codemod those to become AT_* macros again. 😕 Ideally we'd modify pybind to know that it shouldn't display those messages. HANDLE_TH_ERRORS macros disable them.
body_text: If the problem here was with AT_CHECK, then we should probably add some comments. Otherwise, sooner or later, someone will codemod those to become AT_* macros again. 😕 Ideally we'd modify pybind to know that it shouldn't display those messages. HANDLE_TH_ERRORS macros disable them.
